transcript: Well welcome to the human race. You think this is what I had in mind? You think that when I proposed I had this great fantasy going that four years down the line We'd come to the beach and yell at each other over fish. No

segments.text: Well welcome to the human race. You think this is what I had in mind?
You think that when I proposed I had this great fantasy going that four years down the line
We'd come to the beach and yell at each other over fish. No

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well welcome to the human race.  You think this is what I had in mind?  You think that when I proposed, I had this great fantasy going that four years down the line, we'd come to the beach and yell at each other over fish?  No.
